traits.name: Frigid Body
traits.desc: A creature that touches the beetle or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) cold damage.

traits.name: Frigid Weapons
traits.desc: The beetle’s weapon attacks deal an extra 3 (1d6) cold damage (included in the attack).

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.
